short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add live chat overlay on fullscreen video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension enables option to add chat overlay when watching Youtube live streams. It supports transparency, positioning and sending messages (when live is online) without wasting precious screen space.

Click extension icon to configure chat or go to fullscreen and use extension shortcut (default: Alt+O) to access settings while fullscreen is enabled.
